title: unexpected fault address 0x7f638fc9d000
body:
dockerfile:
version: "2"
services:
  # ethereum 1 node
  eth1-node:
    image: ethereum/client-go
    container_name: eth1-node 
    command: "geth --ipcpath /geth.ipc --mainnet --cache=4096"
    networks:
    - ethereum_network
    volumes:
    - eth1-node-data:/root/.ethereum
    deploy:
      resources:
        reservations:
          cpus: '4'
          memory: 8G
        limits:
          cpus: '4'
          memory: 8G
          
volumes:
  # shared volume is need to store the btcd rpc certificates and use it within
  # btcctl and lnd containers.
  eth1-node-data:
#    driver: local
    driver: azure_file
    driver_opts: 
      share_name: eth1-node-data
      storage_account_name: ethereumstorageaccount

networks:
  ethereum_network:
    external: true

-------

command: 
docker compose up 

// the docket context is on azure using azure containers
-----
